_header: Christ is wounded for our wickedness
Subjects: sermons, verse in; Christ, sufferings of; Christ, wounds of; translating
_description: ‘We buþ ful heled of oure siknesse’ in a Latin sermon translating ‘Ipse vulneratus propter iniquitates nostras’ (Isaiah 53:5) — one couplet

                    oure siknesse
